profile.profileDescription: This profile configures CollectiveAccess for a paleontological collection of fossil eggshells.

label.name: Whole Specimen Photo Numbers and Location
Date Modified
label.description: Legacy metadata recording when the record was modified before migration to CollectiveAccess. All future changes are recorded in the Log.

label.name: Description
label.description: This field contains descriptive information about the item cited in the Object Name field that does not occur in other fields.

label.name: Georeference
label.description: Coordinates documenting the location of the item

label.name: Description
label.description: Narrative biography for entity. This is the primary text used to document the entity.

label.name: Source of description
label.description: Source of entity biography. This should be a formal citation if possible. For informal sources a narrative description is acceptable.
